input.sentences: we are starting off at the annual bicycle marathon .
at first it was a bumpy ride .
but soon | we were soaring down the field .
everyone was very competitive throughout the race .
although there could only be one winner | we all enjoyed ourselves .
output.sentences: At the start of the marathon race, the athletes were on their bicycles.
The course they rode on was very bumpy!
On one hill, they went soaring down the field.
The race was very competitive; things were neck-in-neck.
At the end, the winners enjoyed celebration from the crowd.
